Articles.Content: the rover wheels are to big and making a small rover is like building a monster truck

Welcome to the forum @icantthink, your issue has been moved from breaking ground discussion as the wheels are part of the stock game.

Have you tried the RoveMax Model S2? That's what I use for little rovers.

Ah, you see, small rover is the one with tiny wheels. These are the equivalent of autonomous rovers built by humans. Bigger wheels are for rovers that may look small compared to a rocket, but actually are quite big, if you can put a pair of Kerbals in there.
well, of course you can't make anything as small as sojourner or ingenuity with this game. if nothing else, the minimum size for a probe core puts a harsh limit on that

One thing I have found VERY useful - for cars, trucks, rovers, and cranes alike - is Tweakscale. Tweakscale is one of the most useful mods ever, at least for me. If you don't want to use mods, then don't, but I just wanted to tell you that Tweakscale is great for building small stuff, as well as big stuff.

 

By the way, follow @Lisias!!!!
Tweakscale is great, once you edit the config so it applies to all parts that can pass the sanity check. Otherwise the limitations feel too arbitrary.
